body: Decensored too please. Since they did this weird line censoring that doesn't cover anything up anyway, you might as well get rid of it. It only detracts and damages the excellent art displayed here.
Considering most of the pages serve as very very good stand-alone poster-style art, Can someone please post this without text?
Reupload a whole series for ONE new page EVERYTIME. Can't they just add in old post or delete old post

Incase you are wondering why no one translated this yet. It's because it's in old Chinese. Much like early modern English used in Shakespeare's play. So to translate this sucker you have to be well established in both old Chinese and early modern english.
